headline: A Look At Invitation Homes (INVH) Valuation After New Federal Limits On Institutional Home Buying
summary: Invitation Homes (INVH) briefly came under pressure after the Trump administration announced measures barring large institutional investors from buying additional single-family homes, a policy shift that directly targets the company’s core acquisition model. See our latest analysis for Invitation Homes. The policy shock has added to existing pressure on Invitation Homes, with the 90 day share price return of 5.75% and year to date share price return of 3.57% both in negative territory. The 1...
